title: Pocket Knife/multi-tool, "Swiss Champ SOS", Introduced 1985
medium: Assembled stamped, forged, polished stainless steel, aluminum, brass, molded cellulose acetate-butyrate (Cellidor); cut and stitched leather, velcro (case)
provenance: Acquired by Cooper-Hewitt directly from the manufacturer, new in 2013.
dimensions:
Knife (closed): L x W x D: 9.8 x 3.2 x 2.9 cm (3 7/8 x 1 1/4 x 1 1/8 in.)
Case (closed): L x W x D: 11.1 x 6.4 x 4.4 cm (4 3/8 x 2 1/2 x 1 3/4 in.)

tombstone.epitaph: Pocket Knife/multi-tool, "Swiss Champ SOS", Introduced 1985. Assembled stamped, forged, polished stainless steel, aluminum, brass, molded cellulose acetate-butyrate (Cellidor); cut and stitched leather, velcro (case). Gift of Victorinox. 2013-56-1-a/x.
